segments.text: ( Person A comes out of the dressing room ) How did you like the sweater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I loved it . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I can ring you up over here . It comes to $ 87.04 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a credit card with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you open up a card , you can save 10 % on all your purchases today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We always have this offer , so when ever you decide to , just let us know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything else I can help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I was looking at some of your pants , but they are all a bit too long . Do you have alteration services here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It cost $ 7 , and it takes one day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , and have a great day .
segments.speaker: S1
